subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Max Scherzer pitched into the eighth inning, and Jose Iglesias, replacing Miguel Cabrera, homered for Detroit. The Dodgers set a franchise record with their 13th straight road win.
snippet: Max Scherzer pitched into the eighth inning, and Jose Iglesias, replacing Miguel Cabrera, homered for Detroit. The Dodgers set a franchise record with their 13th straight road win.
